menu.label: Cancel temp targets
menu.command: cd ~/myopenaps && PATH=$PATH:/opt/nodejs/bin/ oref0-append-local-temptarget 0 0 | head -1 | jq . | fold -w 23 -s

menu.label: Eating Soon: 60m@80
menu.command: cd ~/myopenaps && PATH=$PATH:/opt/nodejs/bin/ && oref0-append-local-temptarget 80 60 | head -1 | jq . | fold -w 23 -s | head -8

menu.label: Walking: 45m@120
menu.command: cd ~/myopenaps && PATH=$PATH:/opt/nodejs/bin/ && oref0-append-local-temptarget 120 45 | head -1 | jq . | fold -w 23 -s | head -8

menu.label: Running: 3h@140
menu.command: cd ~/myopenaps && PATH=$PATH:/opt/nodejs/bin/ && oref0-append-local-temptarget 140 180 | head -1 | jq . | fold -w 23 -s | head -8

menu.label: Cancel smart bolus
menu.command: cd ~/myopenaps && PATH=$PATH:/opt/nodejs/bin/ oref0-append-local-temptarget 0 0 | head -1 | jq . | fold -w 23 -s

menu.label: Eating (~10g)
menu.command: cd ~/myopenaps && PATH=$PATH:/opt/nodejs/bin/ oref0-append-local-temptarget 80 60 | head -1 | jq . | fold -w 23 -s | head -8

menu.label: Eating (~30g)
